title: Voting for Fonseka:”When you are in the Frying Pan You have to Jump”
content: transCurrent – by Rohini Hensman If we were to ask, ‘Is this a good time for a presidential election?’ the answer would have to be ‘No’. At a time when so many urgent tasks are pending – not least that of rebuilding the war-ravaged areas of the country and resettling lakhs of IDPs in proper…
